H0.text: blood alcohol concentration means the parts of alcohol in the blood in relation to what. Methanol

H1.text: blood alcohol concentration means the parts of alcohol in the blood in relation to what. Isopropanol

H3.text: blood alcohol concentration means the parts of alcohol in the blood in relation to what. ethanol

A4.text: BAC is expressed as mass of alcohol per volume of blood.

A5.text: The pharmacokinetics of ethanol are well characterized by the ADME acronym (absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion).
